name: Guiding Ariadne
text: If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can reveal 3 Counter Traps from your Deck, your opponent chooses 1 for you to add to your hand, and you shuffle the rest back into your Deck.
pendulum_text:
Apply these effects.
? You do not pay LP to activate Counter Trap Cards.
? You do not discard to activate Counter Trap Cards.
